title: The Atomic Submarine (restored, colorized) (1959, sci-fi, imdb score: 5.2)

sources.title: The Atomic Submarine (restored, colorized) (1959, sci-fi, imdb score: 5.2)
sources.description: The Atomic Submarine is a 1959 independently made , American black-and-white science-fiction film directed by Spencer Gordon Bennet and starring Arthur Franz , Dick Foran , Brett Halsey , Joi Lansing and Jean Moorhead , with John Hilliard as the voice of the alien. The film was produced by Alex Gordon and distributed by Allied Artists Pictures Corporation . The storyline of The Atomic Submarine concerns an alien invasion that begins when an underwater UFO (or USO â€“ Unidentified Submerged Object ) attacks the world's shipping for unknown reasons. The film showcases the then-new technology of nuclear submarines , and follows the crew and scientists aboard the atomic-powered USS Tigershark , which has been ordered to hunt down the mysterious underwater saucer and stop its disruption of sea commerce.
